file_content.text: Power reserves low. Access denied due to security lockdown.
Search records. Keyword cross-reference: Cipher Nine, Watcher X, Killik Joining, SLV-16 serum.
[Access the computer]
Searching. One record found. Displaying abstract:
Security Directive 101-3A. I hereby approve the application of Castellan restraints to designate Cipher Nine.
Despite her effectiveness, certain Lords of the Sith have expressed concern over her confrontation with Darth Jadus.
Despite his effectiveness, certain Lords of the Sith have expressed concern over his confrontation with Darth Jadus.
Although her choice of allegiance was laudable, no Cipher agent should ever threaten a Dark Council member.
Although his choice of allegiance was laudable, no Cipher agent should ever threaten a Dark Council member.
Although the outcome was ultimately positive, no Cipher agent should ever threaten a Dark Council member.
This safeguard will allow anyone with the keyword to shut down and reprogram Cipher Nine's mind.
She will be no danger to the Sith or the Empire.
He will be no danger to the Sith or the Empire.
Search records. Keyword: "Castellan restraints," and reversal.
[Access the computer]
One record found. Displaying abstract:
In most subjects, implementation takes between three and thirty days as the IX serum circulates and rewires the brain.
Once the serum is fully absorbed, the subject is primed. We apply a keyword, basic commands and wipe his memory.
No way to reverse the treatment has been developed. Theoretically, one could repeat the cycle and apply a new keyword...
...however, physical side effects of repeated IX serum usage could prove inhibiting. I strongly advise against it.
Search records. Keyword: "IX serum."
[Access the computer]
Downloading chemical schematic. Displaying addendum:
We will be unable to formulate new doses of IX serum until our supply of dimalium-6 is replenished.
Recommend additional forces to Republic-occupied world of Quesh immediately, as the planet's chemical mines remain our only source.
Security override. Terminal shutting down.
You did your job well, became the Hand of Jadus, so they were afraid. Stole your free will. With the IX serum, you can get it back.
The Dark Council used Intelligence to control me. They knew I was a threat as Jadus's Hand.
They opposed Jadus.
You must be proud.
Now you know; you did your job well, so they stole your free will. With the IX serum, you can get it back.
I'm going to Quesh to formulate that serum. I'm going to undo this programming.
I know what I have to do.
Soon.
The Sith wanted me programmed. I doubt they left the old Keeper much choice.
It's the Sith, not Keeper.
He left you with even less.
I gave them everything. They repaid me with this.
Intelligence betrayed me.
Are you really surprised?
This is Watcher Three to Cipher Nine. We've restored power; please proceed to the exit.
